  have h₁ : ∀ n ≥ 1, a n n = n := by
    intro n hn
    exact (ha n hn).1
  
  have h₂ : ∀ n ≥ 1, a n 1 = 3 - 2 * Real.sqrt (1 + a n 2) := by
    intro n hn
    have h₃ : a n n = n := h₁ n hn
    have h₄ : ∀ m ≥ 1, m < n → a n m = m * Real.sqrt (1 + a n (m + 1)) := (ha n hn).2

      have h₆ : a n 1 = 1 * Real.sqrt (1 + a n 2) := by
        have h₇ := h₄ 1 (by linarith)
        have h₈ : 1 < n := by omega
        have h₉ : a n 1 = 1 * Real.sqrt (1 + a n 2) := by
          simp_all [Nat.cast_one] <;> ring_nf at * <;> nlinarith
        nlinarith
      have h₁₀ : Real.sqrt (1 + a n 2) = (a n 1 + 1) / 2 := by

          have h₁₁ := h₁ n hn
          have h₁₂ := h₄ 1 (by linarith)
          have h₁₃ : a n 2 ≥ 0 := by
            have h₁₄ := h₁ n hn
            have h₁₅ := h₄ 1 (by linarith)
            have h₁₆ := h₄ 2 (by linarith)
            nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (1 + a n 2)]
          nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg (1 + a n 2)]
        )]
      nlinarith
    exact h₅
  
  have h₃ : Tendsto (fun n => a n 1) atTop (𝓝 3) := by
    have h₄ : ∀ n ≥ 1, a n 1 = 3 - 2 * Real.sqrt (1 + a n 2) := h₂
    have h₅ : ∀ n ≥ 1, a n 2 = 2 := by

      have h₈ : ∀ n ≥ 1, a n 2 = 2 := h₅
      have h₉ : ∀ n ≥ 1, a n 1 = 3 - 2 * Real.sqrt (1 + 2) := by

        rw [h₈ n hn] at *
        <;> simp_all
        <;> norm_num
        <;> linarith
